summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6131 for the improvement of West 116th Street from approximately 250 feet west of 6th Avenue Northwest to West 114th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85198, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
